fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Sacrifice a Town member to revive another player.
- Sacrifice yourself to revive two players.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Sacrificing a Town member deals an Overkill attack to them.
- If you attempt to sacrifice a non-Town member, your ability will fail.
- You will change the Goal of the first Neutral you revive to the Unseen goal.
- You cannot sacrifice someone more than one time, if you were to be made able to use your ability multiple times at once by any means.
- You cannot sacrifice someone that you have previously revived with your ability.
- You cannot keep a last will due to your practices being forbidden.
